summary: Feature request to expose a `getUpdateHandle()` method on WorkflowStub to allow retrieval of update handles by update ID in the PHP SDK.
userImpact: Users cannot retrieve update handles for in-progress updates, limiting their ability to track and interact with workflow updates.
proposedFix: Add a `getUpdateHandle($updateId)` method to the WorkflowStub class.
resolutionDetails: The feature was implemented and released in a subsequent version.
